Question: Do the glasses look black and large?

Reference Answer: No, the glasses are black but small.

Image path: ./sampled_GQA/n310828.jpg

Program:

```
BOX0=LOC(image=IMAGE,object='glasses')
IMAGE0=CROP(image=IMAGE,box=BOX0)
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE0,question='What color are the glasses?')
ANSWER1=VQA(image=IMAGE0,question='Are the glasses large?')
ANSWER2=EVAL(expr="'yes' if {ANSWER0} == 'black' and {ANSWER1} == 'yes' else 'no'")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER2)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>BOX0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>LOC</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">, <b><span style='color: darkorange;'>object</span></b>='glasses')=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>IMAGE0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>CROP</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>bbox</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">)=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='What color are the glasses?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>black</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER1</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='Are the glasses large?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>no</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER2</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>EVAL</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>expression</span></b>="'yes' if ANSWER0 == 'black' and ANSWER1 == 'yes' else 'no'")=<b><span style='color: red;'>EVAL</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>expression</span></b>="'yes' if 'black' == 'black' and False == 'yes' else 'no'")=<b><span style='color: green;'>no</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER2</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>no</span></b></div><hr>

Answer: no
